channel.title: CVE Feed for Gravity Master -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-47696|2024-08-02T21:16:43.417Z -- gravity%20master -- product%20enquiry%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Gravity Master Product Enquiry for WooCommerce plugin <= 3.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-49761|2024-08-02T22:01:25.920Z -- gravity%20master -- product%20enquiry%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Gravity Master Product Enquiry for WooCommerce.This issue affects Product Enquiry for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-37980|2024-08-02T17:23:27.823Z -- gravity%20master -- custom%20field%20for%20wp%20job%20manager
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Gravity Master Custom Field For WP Job Manager plugin <= 1.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47512|2024-08-02T21:09:37.153Z -- gravity%20master -- product%20enquiry%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Gravity Master Product Enquiry for WooCommerce plugin <= 3.0 versions.
